#DWHD job to analyze incoming delivery
# This version is specific for a specific interface
#
# New in this release:
#
# On Job Level
# ConfigDir: If set, no need to specify the entire path for IDQConfig, PWCConfig, DB2Config or OracleConfig
# ParamDir: If set, all parameter files (if any) are expected to be in the mentioned directory
# SQLDir: If set, all SQL files (if any) are expected to be in the mentioned directory
#
# On Step Level
# paramfile: If set, the mentioned parameter file will be added to the infacmd command line
# Implementation of RunDB2 step type
#    Parameters:
#		connection: the logical name of the connection as it exists in the DB2Config file provided at job level
#       sqlFile: the sql file name as it exists in the SQLDir, provided at job level
#       args: the arguments that should be provided to the db2 command line. Typically used for parameter substitution within the SQL statement. 
#
|Table:Job Definition                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
|DWHD|DHWD Analyze STI Delivery|Version=20170112.0|Persistence=Yes|Max Concurrent=2                |Config Dir=/rabo/sserole/tws/config                      |Param Dir=/rabo/sserole/tws/paramfiles|IDQConfig=idq101.cfg     |DB2Config=rundb2sql.cfg         |
|Steps                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|10  |Extract data             |Run IDQ           |mapping        |project=DWHD_4_Mappings         |application=Appl_DWHD_DeliveryAnalysis                  |mapping=map_ExtractSTIDelivery       |paramfile=interface.param|result=OK|On Error=STOP|Wait=Yes|
|20  |Profile data             |Run IDQ           |profile        |project=DWHD_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Historize_Profiles/Profile_DWHD_PRF_STI_INTERFACE|result=OK                            |On Error=STOP            |Wait=Yes                        |
|30  |Erase temp data          |Run DB2           |connection=??? |sqlFile=truncate_a_table.sql    |args=STI_WC_INTERFACE                                   |On Error=STOP                        |Wait=Yes                                                  |
